name: help
description: Displays a list of available commands.

interface.title: Help Menu
interface.initial_description: Please select a category to see the commands within it.
interface.select_command_prompt: Please select a command to see its details.
interface.no_permission: You do not have permission to use any commands.
interface.no_commands_in_category: No commands found in this category.
interface.expired_description: This help menu has expired. Please use `/help` again.
